14template <typename msg_type>
15class SubListener : public eprosima::fastdds::dds::DataReaderListener {
16
17public:
18 SubListener(msg_type *msg) { st = msg; }
19
20 ~SubListener() override = default;
21
22private:
23 void on_data_available(eprosima::fastdds::dds::DataReader *reader) override;
24
25 void on_subscription_matched(
26 eprosima::fastdds::dds::DataReader *reader,
27 const eprosima::fastdds::dds::SubscriptionMatchedStatus &info) override;
28
29public:
30 // Number of latched publishers
31 int matched_ = 0;
32
33 // Protection against race condition using mutex
34 std::mutex m;
35
36 // Condition variable to indicate msg received
37 std::condition_variable cv;
38
39 // Flag to idicate reception of new data
40 bool new_data{false};
41
42 // Pointer to msg from base class
43 msg_type *st;
44
45public:
46 // Blocks till new data has been received
47 void wait_for_data();
48
49 // Blocks for specific milliseconds till new data has been received
50 void wait_for_data_for_ms(const int t);
51
52public:
54 const float matched() const { return matched_; }
55};
